member.name: T:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IDeviceService
member.summary: Device service providing Jabra USB HID telephony device discovery.

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IDeviceService.DeviceAdded
member.summary: Raised when a device has been added (plugged in).

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IDeviceService.DeviceRemoved
member.summary: Raised when a device has been removed (unplugged).

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IDeviceService.AvailableDevices
member.summary: Get available Jabra HID USB devices that support (softphone) telephony.

member.name: T:JabraHidTelephonyApi.DeviceNotLockedException
member.summary: This exception is thrown when an attempt is made change the call state of a device that is not locked.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.DeviceNotLockedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Error message

member.name: T:JabraHidTelephonyApi.DeviceRemovedException
member.summary: This exception is thrown if the accessed device has been removed from the PC.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.DeviceRemovedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Error message

member.name: T:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice
member.summary: Generic Jabra USB HID device interface for softphone call control integration.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.Lock
member.summary: Lock device. A lock must have been obtained prior to calling any of the Set... methods (SetHookState, SetMicrophoneMute, SetRinger, SetOnHold).
member.remarks: A softphone client must lock a device before it initiates a call. This is to ensure that other softphone clients do not interfere while the call is in progress. When the call is terminated the client must call Unlock() to the unlock the device so it becomes available to other softphone clients. In case the lock could not be obtained, the softphone client should not put the call through.
member.returns: true if lock was obtained; otherwise false

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.Unlock
member.summary: Unlock device. Only the client owning the lock can unlock a device.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetHookState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the state of the hook switch (active call state).
member.remarks: This is only a request. The device may not be able to fulfill the request.
member.param: If set to true the device is off-hook (in a call).
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetAudioLinkState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the state of the audio link (radio link) between a base/dongle and a wireless headset. When an audio link is open, all sounds from the PC will be audible in the headset and audio from your headset microphone will be available to PC applications. An audio link is opened automatically whenever you make or receive a call and closed again when you hang up. Use this command if you would like to listen to music or other audio when you are not on a call. Changes in the audio link state is reported as StateChangeEvent.AudioLinkOpen events.
member.remarks: This is only a request. The device may not be able to fulfill the request.
member.param: If true the device is requested to open an audio link. If false the device is requested to close the audio link.
member.exception: Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetCommunicationLinkState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the state of the communication link (radio link) between a base/dongle and a wireless headset. When a communication link is open, all sounds from the PC will be audible in the headset and audio from your headset microphone will be available to PC applications. A communication link is typically used when you want to join a web conference. It can also be used for manual control of the headset's hook state when it is used with an unsupported softphone. Changes in the communication link state is reported as StateChangeEvent.CommunicationLinkOpen events.
member.remarks: This is only a request. The device may not be able to fulfill the request.
member.param: If true the device is requested to open a communication link. If false the device is requested to close the communication link.
member.exception: Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetMicrophoneMuted(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the microphone mute state.
member.remarks: This is only a request. The device may not be able to fulfill the request.
member.param: If set to true the microphone is muted.
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetRinger(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the ringer state.
member.param: If set to true a ringtone is played in the headset.
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetRinger(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the ringer state and caller ID.
member.param: If set to true a ringtone is played in the headset.
Caller ID
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetRinger(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the ringer state.
member.param: Controls the headset ringing state.
If true no ringtone is played in the headset. Only a visual indication is made.
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetCallerId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the caller ID.
member.param: Caller ID
member.remarks: The caller ID may be truncated by the target device.
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetCallOnHold(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the active call on hold.
member.remarks: This is only a request. The device may not be able to fulfill the request.
member.param: If set to true the active call is set on hold. If set to false the held call is resumed.
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetMessageWaiting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Turns the message waiting indicator on or off.
member.param: Message waiting indicator state
member.exception: Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SetBusylightState(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the state of the busylight.
member.param: if set to true then busylight is turned on
member.exception: Thrown if device has not been locked.
Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.GetBatteryStatus
member.summary: Get current battery status. It is recommended to only call this method to get the initial status and then subscribe to BatteryStatusChanged events. A battery level of 0 percent means that the level is currently unavailable.
member.exception: Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.GetPhoneNumber(JabraHidTelephonyApi.PhoneNumberId)
member.summary: Get phone number.
member.remarks: Currently not supported by any devices.
member.param: Phone number identifier
member.returns: Phone number. Returns null if undefined.
member.exception: Thrown if device has been removed.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SelectProprietaryHidTelephonyInterface
member.summary: Forces the device to use its proprietary GN HID telephony interface for outgoing call HID events to the PC. It is recommended to use the proprietary GN HID telephony interface to avoid signaling conflicts with e.g. Microsoft Skype for Business (Lync). Only applicable for devices that have a proprietary GN HID telephony interface.
member.remarks: Do not call this method if you connect to the integration service. In that case the HID telephony interface selection is controlled by the integration service.
Calling this method may cause a restart of the device, and the USB product ID of the device may change.

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.DeviceRemoved
member.summary:
The DeviceRemoved event is raised when the physical device represented by this object has been removed (unplugged) from the PC. After receiving this event a DeviceRemovedException will be thrown on device access.
When the physical device has been removed it is the object creator's responsibility to call Dispose() on the object. Note: Do not call Dispose synchronously from a DeviceRemoved event handler.

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.ButtonInput
member.summary: The ButtonInput event is raised when a button input is received from a device.

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.StateChanged
member.summary: The StateChanged event is raised when the device state has changed.

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.BatteryStatusChanged
member.summary: The BatteryStatusChanged event is raised when the device's battery status has changed.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.ProductId
member.summary: Get USB product ID
member.value: USB product ID

member.summary: Get device name
member.value: Device name

member.summary: Get audio device name in Windows
member.value: Audio device name

member.summary: Get firmware version
member.value: Firmware version

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.UsbDevicePath
member.summary: Get USB device path for this device's HID telephony top-level collection.
member.value: USB device path

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.DeviceInstanceId
member.summary: Get Windows' Device Instance ID for this device's HID telephony top-level collection.
member.value: Device Instance ID

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.SerialNumber
member.summary: Get serial number. Returns an empty string if the device does not have a serial number.
member.value: Serial number

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.HasProprietaryHidTelephonyInterface
member.summary: Indicates whether the device has a Jabra proprietary HID telephony interface.
member.value: true if the device has a Jabra proprietary HID telephony interface

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsLyncCompliant
member.summary: Indicates whether the device is Microsoft Lync compliant.
member.value: true if the device is Microsoft Lync compliant; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsInBandRingerSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device can play in-band ringtones (ringtones played by the softphone).
member.value: true if in-band ringtones is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsOutBandRingerSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device can play out-band ringtones (ringtones generated locally in the headset).
member.value: true if out-band ringtones is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.UseInBandRinger
member.summary: Controls whether to use an in-band ringtone (the ringtone played by the softphone) or an out-band ringtone (a ringtone generated locally in the headset). Default value is UseInBandRinger = true.
member.remarks: When using out-band ringtone you may hear both a softphone ringtone and and a local ringtone in the headset.
member.value: When true use in-band ringtones; otherwise use out-band ringtones

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsHookStateSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether hook state signaling is supported.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsMicrophoneMuteSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device has microphone mute support.
member.value: true if microphone mute is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsCallOnHoldSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device supports call on hold / resume call (aka. flash).
member.value: true if SetOnHold is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsCallerIdSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device is able to show caller ID.
member.value: true if caller ID is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsBatteryStatusSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device can report battery status.
member.value: true if battery status is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsLineBusySupported
member.summary: Indicates whether line busy (in a call) signaling is supported.
member.value: true if IsLineBusy is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsOutOfRangeSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether 'out of range' signaling is supported for a wireless headset. true if IsOutOfRange is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsSetBusylightSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether busylight is supported.
member.value: true if SetBusylight is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsMessageWaitingSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device has a message waiting indicator. true if the device has a message waiting indicator; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsQDConnectionStateSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device (controller) can report Quick Disconnect(QD) connection state. true if Quick Disconnect(QD) connection state is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsJackConnectionStateSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device (controller) can report jack plug connection state. true if jack connection state is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsAudioLinkSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device supports open/close audio link.
member.value: true if audio link is supported; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsAudioLinkOpen
member.summary: Indicates whether the audio link is open or not. This property is only applicable for wireless headsets.
member.value: true if audio link is open; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsCommunicationLinkSupported
member.summary: Indicates whether the device supports open/close communication link.
member.value: true if audio link is open; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsCommunicationLinkOpen
member.summary: Indicates whether a communication link is open or not. This property is only applicable for wireless headsets.
member.value: true if communication link is open; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsMicrophoneMuted
member.summary: Get current microphone mute state
member.value: true if microphone is muted; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsRinging
member.summary: Get current ringer state.
member.value: true if ring indicator is on; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsOffHook
member.summary: Get current hook state.
member.value: true if device is off-hook (in an active call); otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsOnHold
member.summary: Get current 'call on hold' state.
member.value: true if a call is on hold; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsLineBusy
member.summary: Get current 'line busy' state.
member.value: true if the device is busy (in a call) on one of its supported phone interfaces; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsOutOfRange
member.summary: Get current 'out of range' state for a wireless headset.
member.value: true if the headset is disconnected, or out of range; false if the headset is connected.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsBusylightOn
member.summary: Get current busylight state.
member.value: true if the device's busylight indicator is on; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsHeadsetDocked
member.summary: Get current headset docked state. Only applicable for devices with a dockable headset.
member.value: true if the headset is docked in its base or cradle; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsHeadsetQDConnected
member.summary: Indicates whether a headset is currently connected via a Jabra Quick Disconnect (QD) plug to a controller or adapter. Only applicable for headset controllers or adapters with a QD connector.
member.value: true if the headset is connected; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsHeadsetJackConnected
member.summary: Indicates whether a headset is currently connected via a jack plug to a controller or adapter. Only applicable for headset controllers or adapters with a jack plug connector.
member.value: true if the headset is connected; otherwise false.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IHidTelephonyDevice.IsLocked
member.summary: Indicates whether device is currently locked or not.
member.value: true if the device is locked; otherwise false.

member.name: T:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService
member.summary: Interface for third-party client status integration into Jabra applications, such as Jabra DIRECT.

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.ConnectClient(System.Guid,System.String,System.Version)
member.summary: Connects a client to the integration service. A client must connect to the service before any other property or method is called.
member.param: Unique client ID
Client (softphone) name
Client (softphone) version

member.name: M:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.DisconnectClient(System.Guid)
member.summary: Disconnects a client from the integration service. A client must disconnect before it terminates.
member.param: Unique client ID. Must be the same ID as used in ConnectClient

member.name: E:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.FocusChanged
member.summary: Raised when the focus state has changed. The new state can be determined by reading the IsInFocus property.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.ClientState
member.summary: Current state of the client.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.AudioInputDeviceName
member.summary: The audio input (microphone) device currently selected by the softphone. The AudioInputDeviceName is only used for informational purposes. Setting the AudioInputDeviceName is optional.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.AudioOutputDeviceName
member.summary: The audio output (speaker) device currently selected by the softphone. The AudioOutputDeviceName is only used for informational purposes. Setting the AudioOutputDeviceName is optional.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.CallControlDeviceName
member.summary: The headset device currently selected by the softphone for remote call control. The CallControlDeviceName is only used for informational purposes. Setting the CallControlDeviceName is optional.

member.name: P:JabraHidTelephonyApi.IIntegrationService.IsInFocus
member.summary: Indicates whether this client is in focus. A client is only allowed to lock and access a device when it is in focus.
